attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please will our government ask the leader of China to look into there fur trade.I watched a link that disgusted & horrified me.The chinese people breeding & beating up innocent animals
then skinning them alive for fur.How can our Government sit back & allow this barbaric act to go on.We are suppose to be a nation of animal lovers

rejection.details: The 'title' must be a call to action for HM Government not just say 'Chinese Fur'.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
